About Ocean Rayz

Hi, I'm based in IRB, FL ☀️. I design unique and fun stickers inspired by the ocean and beach life. You can buy my stickers at Nekton Surf Shop, and all designs are created with love by @ocean_unger. Dive into the world of Ocean Rayz and bring the beach vibes with you, wherever you go!
